articles.title: 6 maps predicting snowfall totals Sunday-Monday
articles.description:
"This morning's weather guidance trended toward a higher impact storm track on Sun night/Mon with the greatest impacts felt across southeast MA/RI."

The post 6 maps predicting snowfall totals Sunday-Monday appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Weather forecasts predict significant snowfall in Boston from Sunday night to Monday.
Southeast Massachusetts and Rhode Island expected to experience the highest snowfall totals.
Residents should prepare for potential travel disruptions and hazardous conditions.
